title: 15 MIN Guided Meditation For Manifestation & Success | Feed Your Truth & Inner Fire
description:
This quick and effective 15 minute guided meditation will help you manifest success as you train and master your mind to stay focussed and calm. In uncertain times such as these, through a consistent meditation practice you can take back control of your life by finding conscious stillness to reconnect to your truth and inner fire. 

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

Click The Link To Join & Begin Your FREE 14 Day Yoga & Meditation Journey! 
https://www.bohobeautiful.life/freeyoga

Yoga Instructor: Juliana Spicoluk
Video Production: Mark Spicoluk

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

37 days into my sober journey rebuilding my mental health and damaged life. I've been doing a lot of your meditations and they make things a little bit better each day. Thank you 🙏🙏🙏
My cancer journey continues and these meditations are extremely vital to my healing! 🙏
Such a good one today! “The power is with in me”. I love that. The power to do anything I set my mind to, is with in me!
meditation has been a game changer for my mental health and Im forever grateful for your videos!
